title: Countering Zed as an ADC (patch 6.11)
body: I just had a game as {{champion:22}} ADC and i came up against a {{champion:238}} Mid. After crushing any chance of me having any ability to counter {{champion:238}} by using a {{item:3140}}. I need to know, how i deal with {{champion:238}} as an Patch 6.11 ADC? besides perm'a banning {{champion:238}} is there any way to counter him ??

replies.body: Sterak's is your only hope... I build it as a third item when I'm Ashe vs a Rengar, does wonders for me.
rito buffed zed by nerfing qss so hard, then they also directly buffed him, so you have either hard peel or 100%  ban
A support that can peel you hard asf.
ask ur sup to stand right next to you all the time, get someone like raka, janna because no adc can solo with Zed.
As long his ulti on CD i can solo zed with ashe...
